alfredsnippet.snippet: When ssh login, get warning: `LC_CTYPE cannot change locale utf8`. This is because local shell pass bad `LC_*` environment variables to remote server. Commit the line `SetEnv LC_*` in `/etc/ssh/ssh_config` in **local machine**. [REF](https://superuser.com/questions/485569/how-to-disable-sendenv-variables-set-in-ssh-config-from-ssh-config)
alfredsnippet.name: LC_CTYPE error
